Description: 
Bastion - a new RPG in the style of Diablo, but it differs more colorful graphics. The plot of this role-playing game with the events that unfold in a fantastic universe. Battling with various monsters, players will unlock the secrets of the cataclysm that destroyed the whole world on flying islands are small. In addition to the main plot Bastion you can pursue additional tasks, you can use to earn extra experience points and improve the characteristics of the hero, and get better weapons and equipment.

Version of the game for the PC version supports 1080p with "incredible detail", the revised management scheme with the ability to change the key, gamepad support, and lack of DRM-protection.
